# snowflake_dynamic_tables (Data Source)

## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the dynamic table.

### Read-Only

- `dynamic_tables` (List of Object) The list of dynamic tables. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--dynamic_tables))
